text:
Chrissy Teigen has been pretty candid about her pregnancy so far—tweeting about crazy pregnancy hormones and the baby “sucking the life from me,” making her dry, hungry, and sick. The real talk is both entertaining and relatable—especially if you’ve been pregnant before. Now, the model and television host ‘fessed up to something that a lot of parents-to-be struggle with: coming up with a baby name.

While appearing on The Ellen DeGeneres Show, Teigen revealed the baby’s due date (June!) and said “boy names are really tough. I don’t even think he’ll have a middle name because we can’t come up with a first name.” Teigen went on to explain that it was easy to come up with the name for her first child, Luna, because she was born during a blood moon and Teigen has an affinity for all things space. DeGeneres jokingly suggested some other names to put on the list, “Lunar” and “Urban Legend.”

Teigen also told DeGeneres that friends suggested naming the baby boy John Jr., and she hilariously called out her husband’s response: “But John and his ego, he was like, ‘I don’t want him to feel like he has to live up to that.’ I was like, ‘Wow, you’re a jerk.’”
title: Chrissy Teigen and John Legend Can't Choose a Baby Name

meta_data.description: Chrissy Teigen told Ellen DeGeneres that she and husband John Legend can't choose a name for their baby boy. Find out which names they've discussed.
